text:
I have a customer that is running apache and the customer is haveing a problem 
that a patch is supposed to fix.  The customer says they installed the patch 
however is there any to verify or see all the patches that have been applied to 
the apache???

Thanks,
David Jimenez
creator: jimenez@us.ibm.com
nd@perlig.de
text:
Sure, just make a diff against the original code ...

Next time please address questions like this one to a user support forum. Thanks.
